=== Description ===

Finery theme is a GTK+/Metacity theme I created and which is based on <nowiki>[[http://fibermarupok.deviantart.com/|fibermarupok's]]</nowiki> mockups and Ubuntu's Radiance theme.

=== Concept ===
Since I never felt really comfortable with the Ambiance/Radiance themes, I took fibermarupok's mockup and modified Radiance until it met my idea of a modern, elegant and light theme. Later I also created a dark version of it which now is the pendant to Ambiance.
